| 🛡️ Security Component | 📋 Standard | ✅ Status | 📊 Score | 📅 Last Audit |
|----------------------|------------|-----------|----------|---------------|

| **Authorization** | RBAC | ✅ Compliant | 99% | 2025-06-18 |
